name: Heroes of Adoria
description:
This contains the first three chapters of the "Heroes of Adoria" saga.  It follows the story of our protagonist Cent, with his two close friends Hans and Seria in their small and peaceful village "EastWallow". Where they enjoy the ups and down of their village life, oblivious to the world outside. But it all changed with an event...

This game is a classic JRPG, but employs "active action" on its battles.  We put events throughout the adventure to keeps you entertained even on long dungeons and bosses.

We hope that you can enjoy the wonderful world of "Heroes of Adoria".
